name: icepick
description: Utilities for treating frozen JavaScript objects as persistent immutable collections.

scripts.dist:prod: browserify --standalone icepick icepick.js -g [ envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] | uglifyjs -mc > icepick.min.js
scripts.dist:dev: browserify --standalone icepick icepick.js -g [ envify purge --NODE_ENV development ] | uglifyjs -mc > icepick.dev.js
scripts.preversion: npm run dist:prod && npm run dist:dev
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Alexander Early <alexander.early@gmail.com>
